title: Alone At The End Of The World: My Dark Contract
alternative_title: Mòrì Dúxíng: Wǒ De Hēi'àn Qìyuē ; 末日独行：我的黑暗契约 ; Doomsday Lone Walker: My Dark Pact
status: Mòrì Dúxíng: Wǒ De Hēi'àn Qìyuē ; 末日独行：我的黑暗契约 ; Doomsday Lone Walker: My Dark Pact
description:
Description :
        Before the rebirth at the end of the world, relying on foresight, Xiao Ran hoarded a large amount of supplies and unexpectedly awakened a darkening system, starting a different experience of the apocalypse. While others are starving, Xiao Ran enjoys hot pot and ice cola; while others hide and seek, Xiao Ran relies on a safe stronghold to hunt easily; while others complain about their fate, Xiao Ran has already completed his evolution and awakened his abilities. Xiao Ran steps on his former enemies, saying, "I don't want to kill you, I just want to torment you. I advise you not to..."
